name: Classic Red Leather Jacket
text: Premium quality red leather jacket featuring a sleek tailored fit and durable finish. Perfect for casual and formal occasions.

name: Urban Blue Sneakers
text: Lightweight and breathable sneakers designed for comfort and style. Ideal for daily wear or sports activities.

name: Luxury Leather Tote Bag
text: Elegant and spacious tote bag crafted from premium leather. Combines functionality with timeless style for the modern professional.

name: Precision Chronograph Watch
text: High-end chronograph watch with stainless steel case, sapphire glass, and water-resistant features. A statement piece for every occasion.

name: Polarized Aviator Sunglasses
text: Stylish aviator sunglasses with polarized lenses for superior UV protection. Lightweight frame ensures all-day comfort.
